quotes.text: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious."
"Recognizing the need is the primary condition for design."
"It's through mistakes that you can grow. You have to get bad in order to get good."
"Good design is obvious. Great design is transparent."
"Design adds value faster than it adds cost."
"A problem well stated is a problem half solved."
"“The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
"Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow."
"You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward."
"Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that’s what makes you strong."
"The best way out is always through."
"Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment."
"Action is the foundational key for all success."
"An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory."
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world."
"Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls."
"Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be."
"“Creativity takes courage."
"The purpose of software engineering is to control complexity, not to create it."
"There's no use talking about the problem unless you talk about the solution."
"“Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much."
"“No one can whistle a symphony. It takes a whole orchestra to play it."
"A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good."
"Simplicity is prerequisite for reliability."
"Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication."
"A good way to have good ideas is by being unoriginal."
"There is no failure except in no longer trying."
"“It always seems impossible until it’s done."
"Opportunities don't happen. You create them."
"Critical thinking and curiosity are the key to creativity."
"Small acts, when multiplied by millions of people, can transform the world."
"Together, ordinary people can achieve extraordinary result."
